abstract: Google spawns start-ups in Kansas City — and also reinvents human resources. Why using social media well is harder than you think. Ten ideas for marketing and advertising. And do you think it’s harder to run a business today than it was five years ago?
snippet: Google spawns start-ups in Kansas City — and also reinvents human resources. Why using social media well is harder than you think. Ten ideas for marketing and advertising. And do you think it’s harder to run a business today than it was five years...
lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners this week.

headline.main: This Week in Small Business: Firing the Founder
